articles.title: PlayStation Showcase 2023: all the news from Sony's big gaming event - The Verge
articles.description: Sony’s PlayStation Showcase on May 24th, was packed with news about games and hardware accessories for the PS5 and PSVR 2. We saw the Project Q handheld, Marathon, and a new trailer for Spider-Man 2. Here’s our coverage of the event.
